name: Forgotten Factory
description:
Being developed as the final project for my CS degree, Forgotten Factory is an action/stealth platformer set in a cyberpunk-ish near future, where a kid ventures into a derelict factory in search of adventure and ends up with far more than he bargained for.

I intend to deliver frequent devlogs regarding design and development, as required by the course, and hope that the final result will be something that could be considered a complete game.
